text: @GregAbbott_TX Due to inadequate testing and “under reporting” Covid-19 cases are not counted until hospitalization is required. This makes it extremely difficult for hospitals to plan and do what is necessary to operate in a pandemic. https://t.co/WcAuWVJ1o7
